comments.body: Can you remove the comments from the recipe? (You can do that later in the feedstock.)
You can use the short version `GPL-3.0`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +58,62 @@  # Prefer the short version, e.g: GPL-2.0 instead of GNU General Public License version 2.0
  # See https://opensource.org/licenses/alphabetical
  license: GNU Affero General Public v3.0
  # The license_family, i.e. "BSD" if license is "BSD-3-Clause". (optional)
  license_family: GPL
